title: Reflected Passion
description: Where passion, reality and destiny combine!Dale Wincott is a 27 year-old woman born into Bostonian wealth, attending boarding school and groomed to marry into the social hierarchy. While her mother is a society matriarch, her father feels for his daughter and helps Dale find a life on her own as a furniture restorer.Françoise Marie Aurélie de Villerey is a 28 year-old Countess, born into the lesser French aristocracy and forced to marry a count much older than herself. For ten years she was his trophy wife, forced to endure whatever his wishes were until the day he finally died, three years ago. He had broken her emotionally and she no longer cared for what life had to offer, slipping from one sexual partner to another as often as she would change her clothes.Until... that one night when Françoise looked up during a sexual encounter and saw Dale watching her from the mirror. A veritable angel, full of innocence and curiosity, who touched her very soul.Françoise discovers life anew and for Dale it is a sexual awakening, discovering not only her sensual nature but finally understanding herself.
author: Erica Lawson
